title: Machine Learning Model Design and Socio-Technical Systems Integration Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistics and programming comprehension, foundational machine learning concepts
context.additional_context: Online corporate training program for current professionals, requiring an asynchronous structure adaptable to individual learning paces. Structured around social domain application cases

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more impacts of data scientists' subjectivity in the machine learning model design process.
From a sociotechnical systems perspective, learners can analyze two or more social contexts to consider when deploying machine learning models.
Learners can propose two or more extended model design stages by applying theories from philosophers/system thinkers to the existing ML design process.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
